description.info: Yeah, they kept me around for this long.
I spoke on a panel called Dev Evangelism: Building a Community of Advocates.
I was included as one of LinkedIn's top professionals 35 and under!
Joined as Clarifai's first developer evangelist and first female engineer.

description.what: Started as Director of Outreach for
description.info: Hacker Fund is an awesome charity focused on bringing tech education to high schools.
Included as one of Glamour's 35 Women Under 35 Changing the Tech Industry!

description.what: Spoke at the Napa Valley Film Festival for starring in the documentary
description.info: Check out more about the documentary here!
Joined after graduation as a software engineer & Venmo's first developer evangelist.
Graduated with a B.S. in Computer Science and a Spanish minor. Go Cyclones!
Spoke about growing up in STEM. I talked about LEGOs, too.

This was, literally, a hackathon in the sky, on a flight from San Fran to London. My awesome team ended up being a winner, and we presented our project to various events, and we spoke to the U.N. later in the Fall.
Got to experience Silicon Valley for the first time. It was nice. I also did a lot of JavaScript.
Worked on the Bing Ads team to bring you some awesome mobile web experiences. That I'm sure you use every day.

My first internship after my freshman year. I ate so much food.
